author: Steve_OS
title: NBA 2K16 Hits 4 Million Sales Milestone in First Week of Release
text: NBA 2K16 Hits 4 Million Sales Milestone in First Week of Release 08:04 AM - October 2, 2015 by Steve_OS 2K has just announced NBA 2K16 has set an unprecedented franchise record, selling-in over four million units worldwide within the first week of release. Digital sales have doubled from last year and online games have nearly tripled. Quote: Our goal was simple, make NBA 2K16 the most playable, authentic basketball experience ever, said Greg Thomas, president of Visual Concepts. The development team demonstrated tremendous dedication to recreating every nuance of the sport both on and off-court, which has been the driving force behind our early success. Congratulations to 2K Sports on their early record-breaking success with NBA 2K16, said Matt Holt, NBA vice president, global merchandising. Each year, 2K has continued to raise their commitment to innovation, authenticity and gameplay - bringing fans the very best with the NBA 2K franchise. # 1 Impetuous65 @ 10/02/15 08:11 AM Congrats VC # 2 tsbmolina @ 10/02/15 08:25 AM Simply amazing and well deserved. People were calling me crazy when I said the NBA 2k series was just as financially important as the Grand Theft Auto franchise for Take-Two http://www.operationsports.com/forum...to-series.html It doesn't sound so far fetched now, does it? NBA 2k16 will sell 10 million copies as I predicted before it's release. Congratulations 2K! # 3 Dazraz @ 10/02/15 08:31 AM Invest, put in the hard work & the rewards will come. Much deserved. Every Developer of any sports game needs to look to this game as a reference point. NBA 2K16 should be the standard in sports games not the exception. # 4 ataman5 @ 10/02/15 08:33 AM Congratulations hope you keep it up!
